name: Goodwill Industries of Northern New England
specialty: Clinic/Center  Rehabilitation  Comprehensive Outpatient Rehabilitation Facility (CORF)

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Goodwill Industries of Northern New England is a Clinic/Center  Rehabilitation  Comprehensive Outpatient Rehabilitation Facility (CORF) provider based in Portland, ME. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $106.0M in Medicaid payments across 313K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $106.0M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 13,253 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
